data.name: TweetDeck Ultra Dark
data.description: !!! Enable Dark Theme in tweetdeck Settings !!!

data.name: YouTube Ultra Dark
data.description:
Set a darker background and scrollbar. Add transparent blurred elements.

!!! ENABLE NIGHT MODE in YouTube settings.

data.name: The Old Reader slim header
data.description: Removes titlebar from theoldreader header and makes it more compact

data.name: SoundCloud Ultra Dark
data.description: This is incredibly dark and beauty theme for SoundCloud.com

data.name: Semi-updated - New UI Anilist 2020 (DARK)
data.description:
SOMETHINGS ARE STILL BROKEN !

This is a Edited version of : https://github.com/Z3ROGRAV1TYx/Anilist-Dark-Theme (open for more detailed and accurate information )

This is a theme created for Anilist to enhance the user's viewing experience.

By LeoSan

user.name: LeoSan
user.about: For more information about me : https://anilist.co/user/LeoSan/

data.name: True Dark Neo Pieces (chess.com and lichess.org)
data.description:
Changes both the chess.com and lichess.org piece style to "Neo" except the black pieces are actually the appropriate dark color instead of light grey.

Also swaps the "wood4" board theme with the chess.com "Walnut" theme.

data.name: Coub Dark with larger Video player
data.description: Just a skin for the Website Coub
